'''General Michael Flynn''' is a retired United States Army Lieutenant General who served as National Security Advisor to [[Donald Trump]] in 2017. He has been associated with the [[QAnon]] conspiracy theory and has promoted it in interviews and on social media. Flynn has also had connections to [[InfoWars]], where he has appeared as a guest multiple times. He was also involved in various [[Stop the Steal]] rallies in the aftermath of the 2020 election.
